thread.title: BlackBerry's Productivity Tab gets overhauled with a new look and features!
thread.title_full: BlackBerry's Productivity Tab gets overhauled with a new look and features!

author: Bla1ze
title: BlackBerry's Productivity Tab gets overhauled with a new look and features!
text:
In addition to the various other app updates BlackBerry has released recently they've now also announced that they've made improvements to the Productivity Tab app found on BlackBerry Android devices such as Priv, DTEK50 and DTEK60.

In addition to the various other app updates BlackBerry has released recently through Google Play , they've now also announced that they've made improvements to the Productivity Tab app found on BlackBerry Android devices such as Priv , DTEK50 and DTEK60 .
